name: UnofficialKrogerCart
0:
”Alexa, open Unofficial Kroger Cart”
”Add peanut butter.”
”All done.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: unofficial kroger cart
des:
This skill will allow you to add items to your Kroger shopping cart. When you are finished, please visit kroger.com or use the Kroger app to review your cart and make your purchase.

To add one item quickly:
“Alexa, ask Unofficial Kroger Cart to add peanut butter.”

or to add several items to your cart:
"Alexa, open Unofficial Kroger Cart"
"add peanut butter"
"add 3 bags of Kroger pretzel rods"
"add Kroger spaghetti sauce"
"all done"

*Tip!
When adding products, try to be descriptive. The more information you give about the product, the better results we can provide. Eg. “Add milk.” vs “Add 1 gallon of Kroger skim milk.”

You will need to link your Kroger account in the settings for this skill (within the Alexa app).

The skill is not sponsored or endorsed by Kroger.
